ygData.subject: Seed Status
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there any way to know when a specific seed url has finished being crawled?  The reason I ask is that I need to know when a seed is done so that I can index

Is there any way to know when a specific seed url has finished being
crawled?  The reason I ask is that I need to know when a seed is done
so that I can index that url with lucene.  I have successfully writen
a DiskWriterProcessor that does a good job mirroring a site and
writing it disk.  Now I need to Index each site separately.  I would
like to use the current threads that Heritrix has instead of indexing
after a full crawl has been comleted.  If I knew when a seed is
finished then, i can spawn my indexer.  Im not sure if I was able to
articulate this correctly, but I hope you get the jist of it.  
Thanks,

~chris
